name: sql_mcp_tool
description: Tool for querying SQL Server metadata using structured parameters.

entry_file: final_mcp.py
entry_endpoint: /v1/tool-use
metadata_endpoint: /v1/metadata

tools:
  - tool: get_table_schema
    description: Get schema of a table
    parameters:
      table: Name of the table

  - tool: get_column_data
    description: Fetch a columnâ€™s data with a WHERE clause
    parameters:
      table: Name of the table
      select_col: Column to select
      where_col: Column to filter on
      value: Value for the filter

  - tool: get_column_population_logic
    description: Stored procedures that insert/update a specific column
    parameters:
      column: Name of the column

  - tool: get_object_definition
    description: SQL definition for a view or stored procedure
    parameters:
      object: Name of the object

  - tool: get_job_status
    description: Last run status of a SQL Server Agent job
    parameters:
      job: Name of the job
